ARR233

Class SessionTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • ARR233.SessionTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class SessionTable
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A session table using a concurrency hashmap that implements read and write locks (based on my understanding of the docs) Should be initialized by a listener that will clear the table after a given time of sessions expired after some amount of time
    Author:
    Alice (arr233)/Spencer (shs257)

      SimpleEntry get(long id)
      Retrieve a session by ID
      boolean put(SimpleEntry session)
      Store or update a session
      long removeOldEntries()
      A runnable service to be called by a listener removing entries that are more than two days past expiration Does not remove retired sessions until the above condition is met
      void run()
      runnable holder of removal service
      java.lang.String toString()
      Prints session table, used for debugging

      • removeOldEntries

        public long removeOldEntries()
        A runnable service to be called by a listener removing entries that are more than two days past expiration Does not remove retired sessions until the above condition is met
        Returns:
        number of sessions removed
